item.title: Katherine add a quote by Philippa Gregory
item.description: "If it means something, take it to heart. If it means nothing, it's nothing. Let it go." -- Philippa Gregory

item.title: Katherine add a quote by Billy Sunday
item.description: "Going to church doesnâ€™t make you a Christian any more than going to a garage makes you an automobile." -- Billy Sunday

item.title: Katherine add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "Love all, trust a few, do wrong to none." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Katherine add a quote by William Shakespeare
Katherine add a quote by William Shakepeare
item.description: "The evil that men do lives after them; the good is oft interred with their bones." -- William Shakepeare

item.title: Katherine add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "My words fly up, my thoughts remain below: Words without thoughts never to heaven go." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Katherine add a quote by Milan Kundera
item.description: "We can never know what to want, because, living only one life, we can neither compare it with our previous lives nor perfect it in our lives to come." -- Milan Kundera

item.title: Katherine add a quote by Ernest Hemingway
item.description: "Always do sober what you said you'd do drunk. That will teach you to keep your mouth shut." -- Ernest Hemingway

item.title: Katherine add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "Even a manically depressed robot is better to talk to than nobody." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Katherine add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "When you're cruising down the road in the fast lane and you lazily sail past a few hard-driving cars and are feeling pretty pleased with yourself and then accidently change down from fourth to first instead of third thus making your engine leap out of your hood in a rather ugly mess, it tends to throw you off stride in much the same way that this remark threw Ford Prefect off his." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Katherine add a quote by John Kennedy Toole
item.description: "When Fortuna spins you downward, go out to a movie and get more out of life." -- John Kennedy Toole
